title: Collateral Command Distribution Status File Schema
description: Collateral Command Distribution Status File Schema

transactionIdentification.description: Provides details about unique transaction identification known by the participant

participantIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

distributionCommandNumber.description: Number assigned by the Central Depository for each type of collateral

collateralIdentification.description: Collateral identification as known by party

quantity.description: Quantity requested to distribution with command

operationValueAmount.description: Amount requested to the distribution with command

operationValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

collateralValueAmount.description: Collateral accepted value amount after taking into account the haircut

collateralValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

collateralCommandDistributionStatusCode.description: Provides a proprietary status of each processing requested
collateralCommandDistributionStatusCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

errorIdentificationCode.description: Error code for collateral command distribution status
errorIdentificationCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalErrorCollateralCode, ExternalErrorRegistrationCode, ExternalAllocationErrorCode

collateralCommandDistributionInstruction.description: Status code for collateral command distribution instruction
collateralCommandDistributionInstruction.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

instructionErrorIdentificationCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalErrorCollateralCode, ExternalErrorRegistrationCode, ExternalAllocationErrorCode
